languages.text: "Мой отец властвует очень давно, он пережил уже троих собственных хронистов. А мне было бы интереснее поговорить с кем-то, кто только вкусил власти и ответственности. Кроме того... по правде сказать..." {n}Эвейн немного смущается.{/n} "...я не то чтобы особо любимый и приближенный потомок Каллигоса Винтерскейла. Случаи, когда я сколь-либо продолжительно говорил с отцом, можно пересчитать по пальцам одной руки. И половина из них была обменом сообщений через {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}астропата{/g}. Так что я, можно сказать, не избалован общением с Вольными Торговцами".

traits.locale_text: "Мой отец властвует очень давно, он пережил уже троих собственных хронистов. А мне было бы интереснее поговорить с кем-то, кто только вкусил власти и ответственности. Кроме того... по правде сказать..." {n}Эвейн немного смущается.{/n} "...я не то чтобы особо любимый и приближенный потомок Каллигоса Винтерскейла. Случаи, когда я сколь-либо продолжительно говорил с отцом, можно пересчитать по пальцам одной руки. И половина из них была обменом сообщений через {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}астропата{/g}. Так что я, можно сказать, не избалован общением с Вольными Торговцами".

languages.text: "My father has ruled for an exceptionally long time. He has already outlived three of his chroniclers. I would be far more interested in speaking to someone who had just recently acquired their first taste of power and responsibility. Besides... to be perfectly honest..." {n}Evayne appears to be slightly embarrassed.{/n} "I am not exactly Calligos Winterscale's most favoured descendant. I could count on one hand the number of times I have had meaningfully long conversations with my father. And for half of those conversations, we exchanged messages through an {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropath{/g}. I think it prudent to say I have not exactly been lavished with the attention and insight of a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "My father has ruled for an exceptionally long time. He has already outlived three of his chronicles. I would be more interested in speaking to someone who just recently had their first taste of power and responsibility. Besides... To be perfectly honest..." {n}Evayne appears to be slightly embarrassed.{/n} "I am not exactly Calligos Winterscale's most favoured descendant. I could count on one hand the number of times I have had meaningfully long conversations with my father. For half of those conversations, we exchanged messages using the services of an {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropath{/g}. Therefore, I cannot say I have been spoiled by association with Rogue Traders."

languages.text: «Mi padre ha estado gobernando durante un tiempo especialmente largo. Ya ha sobrevivido a tres de sus cronistas. Me interesaría mucho más hablar con alguien que haya obtenido poder y responsabilidad recientemente. Además... para serle completamente honesto...». {n}Evayne parece un poco avergonzado.{/n} «no soy precisamente el descendiente favorito de Calligos Winterscale. Podría contar con una mano las veces que he tenido conversaciones significativamente largas con mi padre. Y en la mitad de esas conversaciones, hemos intercambiado mensajes a través de un {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astrópata{/g}. Se podría decir que no he recibido la suficiente atención y conocimientos de un Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "My father has ruled for an exceptionally long time. He has already outlived three of his chroniclers. I would be far more interested in speaking to someone who had just recently acquired their first taste of power and responsibility. Besides... to be perfectly honest..." {n}Evayne appears to be slightly embarrassed.{/n} "I am not exactly Calligos Winterscale's most favoured descendant. I could count on one hand the number of times I have had meaningfully long conversations with my father. And for half of those conversations, we exchanged messages through an {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropath{/g}. I think it prudent to say I have not exactly been lavished with the attention and insight of a Rogue Trader."

Se podría decir que no he recibido la suficiente atención y conocimientos de un Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: "Mein Vater herrscht seit außergewöhnlich langer Zeit. Er hat schon drei seiner Chronisten überlebt. Ich wäre sehr viel mehr daran interessiert, mit jemandem zu sprechen, der erst kürzlich das erste Mal von Macht und Verantwortung gekostet hat. Zudem ... um ganz ehrlich zu sein ..."{n}, Evayne wirkt etwas beschämt,{/n} "bin ich nicht unbedingt Calligos Winterzunders Lieblingsnachfahre. Ich kann an einer Hand abzählen, wie oft ich eine lange, bedeutsame Unterhaltung mit meinem Vater geführt habe. Und bei der Hälfte dieser Unterhaltungen haben wir Nachrichten über einen {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathen{/g} ausgetauscht. Es lässt sich wohl sagen, dass ich nicht unbedingt mit der Aufmerksamkeit und den Einsichten eines Freihändlers überschüttet wurde."
languages.original_text: "My father has ruled for an exceptionally long time. He has already outlived three of his chroniclers. I would be far more interested in speaking to someone who had just recently acquired their first taste of power and responsibility. Besides... to be perfectly honest..." {n}Evayne appears to be slightly embarrassed.{/n} "I am not exactly Calligos Winterscale's most favoured descendant. And for half of those conversations, we exchanged messages through an {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropath{/g}. I think it prudent to say I have not exactly been lavished with the attention and insight of a Rogue Trader."

Es lässt sich wohl sagen, dass ich nicht unbedingt mit der Aufmerksamkeit und den Einsichten eines Freihändlers überschüttet wurde."

languages.text: « Mon père est au pouvoir depuis si longtemps qu'il a déjà enterré trois de ses chroniqueurs. Je trouve bien plus intéressant de m'entretenir avec quelqu'un découvrant à peine le pouvoir et les responsabilités. Et puis... pour être parfaitement honnête... {n}Une légère gêne semble s'emparer d'Evayne.{/n} On ne peut pas dire que je sois le descendant favori de Calligos Winterscale. Je peux compter sur les doigts d'une main le nombre de conversations marquantes que j'ai eues avec mon père, et pour la moitié d'entre elles, elles étaient constituées de messages échangés par l'intermédiaire d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astropathe{/g}. Je pense qu'on peut dire sans trop s'avancer que je n'ai jamais vraiment pu profiter de l'attention et des connaissances d'un libre-marchand. »
languages.original_text: "My father has ruled for an exceptionally long time. He has already outlived three of his chroniclers. I would be far more interested in speaking to someone who had just recently acquired their first taste of power and responsibility. Besides... to be perfectly honest..." {n}Evayne appears to be slightly embarrassed.{/n} "I am not exactly Calligos Winterscale's most favoured descendant. I could count on one hand the number of times I have had meaningfully long conversations with my father. And for half of those conversations, we exchanged messages through an {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropath{/g}. I think it prudent to say I have not exactly been lavished with the attention and insight of a Rogue Trader."

Je peux compter sur les doigts d'une main le nombre de conversations marquantes que j'ai eues avec mon père, et pour la moitié d'entre elles, elles étaient constituées de messages échangés par l'intermédiaire d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astropathe{/g}. Je pense qu'on peut dire sans trop s'avancer que je n'ai jamais vraiment pu profiter de l'attention et des connaissances d'un libre-marchand. »

languages.text: “我父亲已经统治了太久太久，甚至先后已经有三位编年史官先他而去。我更希望能与初尝权力与责任滋味的人交流。另外……老实说……”{n}艾维尼似乎有些尴尬。{/n}“老实说，我并非卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔最宠爱的孩子，我与父亲进行过的有意义的长谈屈指可数。而在这些谈话中，有一半左右的谈话，是通过{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}星语者{/g}交换的信息进行的。我认为，可以这么说，我身上缺乏行商浪人必不可少的专注与洞见。”
languages.original_text: "My father has ruled for an exceptionally long time. He has already outlived three of his chroniclers. I would be far more interested in speaking to someone who had just recently acquired their first taste of power and responsibility. Besides... to be perfectly honest..." {n}Evayne appears to be slightly embarrassed.{/n} "I am not exactly Calligos Winterscale's most favoured descendant. I could count on one hand the number of times I have had meaningfully long conversations with my father. And for half of those conversations, we exchanged messages through an {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropath{/g}. I think it prudent to say I have not exactly been lavished with the attention and insight of a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “我父亲已经统治了太久太久，甚至先后已经有三位编年史官先他而去。我更希望能与初尝权力与责任滋味的人交流。另外……老实说……”{n}艾维尼似乎有些尴尬。{/n}“老实说，我并非卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔最宠爱的孩子，我与父亲进行过的有意义的长谈屈指可数。而在这些谈话中，有一半左右的谈话，是通过{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}星语者{/g}交换的信息进行的。我认为，可以这么说，我身上缺乏行商浪人必不可少的专注与洞见。”

languages.text: 「我が父は、非常に長い間統治してきた。すでに3人の年代記作者よりも長生きしている。だから、権力と責任を初めて知ったばかりの者と話すことの方が、俺にとってはずっと興味深いことなんだ。それに…正直に言ってしまえば…」{n}エヴァインは少しバツが悪そうにしている。{/n}「俺は、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの最もお気に入りの息子というわけではない。父と有意義な会話をした回数は片手で数えられるほどだ。それにその会話の半分も、{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}感応通信官{/g}を通したメッセージの交換でね。自由開拓者の関心と洞察が、俺に対して十分に向けられたことは今までにない、と言うのが賢明だろうな」
languages.original_text: "My father has ruled for an exceptionally long time. He has already outlived three of his chroniclers. I would be far more interested in speaking to someone who had just recently acquired their first taste of power and responsibility. Besides... to be perfectly honest..." {n}Evayne appears to be slightly embarrassed.{/n} "I am not exactly Calligos Winterscale's most favoured descendant. I could count on one hand the number of times I have had meaningfully long conversations with my father. And for half of those conversations, we exchanged messages through an {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropath{/g}. I think it prudent to say I have not exactly been lavished with the attention and insight of a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「俺の父の統治期間はとても長い。すでに父の年代記は3冊を超える程だよ。初めて権力と責任の味を堪能したばかりの人間と話す方がうんと面白いさ。それに…キッパリと言ってしまえば…」{n}エヴァインは少しバツが悪そうだ。{/n}「俺は正直、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの一番のお気に入りの子供じゃない。父とそこそこの長さで意味のある会話をしたのは、片手で数えられるほどさ。それにその会話の半分も、{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}感応通信官{/g}を通したメッセージ交換だよ。俺は自由開拓者に気にかけてもらっても、腕を見込まれてもいない、と言う方が賢明かな」

「我が父は、非常に長い間統治してきた。すでに3人の年代記作者よりも長生きしている。だから、権力と責任を初めて知ったばかりの者と話すことの方が、俺にとってはずっと興味深いことなんだ。それに…正直に言ってしまえば…」{n}エヴァインは少しバツが悪そうにしている。{/n}「俺は、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの最もお気に入りの息子というわけではない。父と有意義な会話をした回数は片手で数えられるほどだ。それにその会話の半分も、{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}感応通信官{/g}を通したメッセージの交換でね。自由開拓者の関心と洞察が、俺に対して十分に向けられたことは今までにない、と言うのが賢明だろうな」

languages.text: "Babam, istisnai uzunlukta bir süredir Hür Tacirlik yapıyor. Vakanüvislerinden üçünü mezara koydu bile. Güç ve sorumluluğun tadına yeni varmış biriyle konuşmak çok daha ilgimi çekiyor. Ayrıca... Dürüst olmak gerekirse..." {n}Evayne biraz utanmış gibi görünüyor.{/n} "Calligos Winterscale'in en gözde oğlu olduğum söylenemez. Babamla anlamlı ve uzun konuşmalar yaptığım zamanların sayısı, bir elin parmaklarını geçmez. Bu konuşmaların yarısı da bir {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropat{/g} aracılığıyla gerçekleşti. Sanırım bir Hür Tacir'in alaka ve fikirlerine tam olarak mazhar olmadığımı söylemek, yerinde olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "My father has ruled for an exceptionally long time. He has already outlived three of his chroniclers. I would be far more interested in speaking to someone who had just recently acquired their first taste of power and responsibility. Besides... to be perfectly honest..." {n}Evayne appears to be slightly embarrassed.{/n} "I am not exactly Calligos Winterscale's most favoured descendant. I could count on one hand the number of times I have had meaningfully long conversations with my father. And for half of those conversations, we exchanged messages through an {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropath{/g}. I think it prudent to say I have not exactly been lavished with the attention and insight of a Rogue Trader."

Sanırım bir Hür Tacir'in alaka ve fikirlerine tam olarak mazhar olmadığımı söylemek, yerinde olacaktır."
